nodes.text: The Tund system was a mysterious star system located in the Centrality sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Tund, a hidden world that became the home of a Toong Podracer pilot named Ben Quadinaros.

The Tund system was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 1999 prequel trilogy film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Lando Calrissian and the Mindharp of Sharu, a 1983 novel written by L. Neil Smith.
